price: 88 Le Prophète se plaignit : « Seigneur ! Ces gens refusent de croire. »
arabic: وَقِيلِهِۦ يَٰرَبِّ إِنَّ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ قَوۡمٞ لَّا يُؤۡمِنُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: waqīlihi yārabbi inna hāulāi qawmun lā yu'minūna
